message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game.
Take it or leave it. I'm not going for a lowball
A slight adjustment from my previous offer. Still a fair split, but with a bit more for me.
You're not budging, I am. I'll take a bit more
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much. This is a fair split, considering the value of money is decreasing.
I'm not going to let you get the better of me. Take it or leave it
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to let you take the majority. This is my final offer.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking control now
Last chance, Bob. I'm going back to my original offer, but with a hint of desperation. Take it or leave it.
You're out of chances, Alice. I'm taking the majority
No more games, Bob. I'm going back to a 50/50 split. This is my last offer.
